name: Need For Seed: Undergrowth
description:
Steer vines to grow flowers then steer a bee to pollinate the flowers. 'Fertilizer' is your friend, lawnmowers are not.

Originally made by Connor Halford in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34 with the dual themes of 'Growing' and 'Two Button Controls', later updated based on feedback from the LD community. I made this game for the wonderful PICO-8 fantasy console by Lexaloffle Games, you should check it out. You can play the original 48-hour version on the forum thread about this game. I also made a timelapse of me making it and a post-mortem/discussion/results/favorites blog post.
